titleStmt.title: A consideration of the depriued and silenced ministers arguments, for their restitution to the vse and libertie of their ministerie exhibited in their late supplication, vnto the honorable states assembled in this present Parliament. By Gabriel Powel.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Gabriel, 1576-1611.

titleStmt.title: A consideration of the depriued and silenced ministers arguments, for their restitution to the vse and libertie of their ministerie exhibited in their late supplication, vnto the honorable states assembled in this present Parliament. By Gabriel Powel.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Gabriel, 1576-1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Thomas Adams,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Certaine arguments to perswade and provoke the most honorable and high court of Parliament now assembled.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A1".
Running title reads: A consideration of the depriued ministers supplication &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
